alert.note: Alert for Burt; Washington (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 30 at 4:30PM CDT until July 30 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM CDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL MONONA...NORTHWESTERN POTTAWATTAMIE...WESTERN HARRISON...SOUTHEASTERN BURT AND CENTRAL WASHINGTON COUNTIES... At 429 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles northeast of Herman, or 5 miles southeast of Tekamah, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Blair, Tekamah, Missouri Valley, Logan, Fort Calhoun, Mondamin, Modale, Herman, Craig, Magnolia, Little Sioux, Pelican Point State Recreation Area, Wilson Island State Park, Summit Lake State Recreation Area, Desoto Bend National Wildlife Refuge, and Historical Village Welcome Center. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
